Pre-Game Insights: AFC has given praise to Vietnam, who impressed against Japan in the first match of Group D. Indonesia, coached by Shin Tae Yong, also took a positive view of their 3-1 loss to Iraq.
Others: The match between Indonesia and Vietnam in the second matchday of Group D in the AFC Asian Cup 2023 will take place on Friday, January 19, 2024, at Stadion Abdullah bin Khalifa, Doha. This is the first meeting between the two ASEAN teams in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is not just a friendly rivalry between the two Southeast Asian nations, but also a crucial match as the outcome will significantly impact their chances of advancing to the knockout stages.
